name: Megalia
description:
Welcome to the prototype, called Megalia. This is something to test out but will evolve overtime.

Controls

Sandbox

-click on a box to add a pixel, as usual.

-Living things can only be spawned one time.

Survival

Left or right arrow keys to move (or A and D)

Up arrow key to jump (or W)

Down arrow key to mine down. (or S)

Space to place down a block.

E to interact

B to attack.

Features

-Physics

-Sandbox mode!

-Test mode. (Unnamed.)

-Inventory

-Terrain generation

-multiple blocks/entities to use in sandbox.

This is a fangame of Terraria
